src:
Futbol bo‘yicha Qozog‘iston chempioni ma’lum bo‘ldi

04 Nov 2019, 16:47

“Ostona” klubi Qozog‘iston chempionati 32-turida “Tobol”ni mag‘lub etdi va muddatidan avval chempionga aylandi.


Foto: Twitter/@fc_astana

Mavsum tugashiga bir tur qolganda Nur-Sulton shahri vakili ikkinchi o‘rindagi “Qayrat”ni to‘rt ochko ortda qoldirmoqda.
Shu tariqa “Ostona” oltinchi marta chempionat g‘olibligini qo‘lga kiritdi va bu borada “Irtish”ning (beshta chempionlik) rekordini yangiladi.
Shu bilan birga “Ostona” ketma-ket oltinchi bor chempionlikka erishdi.

Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
The champion of Kazakhstan became known

04 Nov 2019, 16:47

"Astana" beat "Tobol" in the 32nd round of the championship of Kazakhstan and became the champion ahead of schedule.


Photo: Twitter / @ fc_astana

Just before the end of the season, Nur-Sultan will leave Kairat in the second place with four points.
Thus, Astana won the championship for the sixth time and broke the record of Irtysh (five champions).
At the same time, "Astana" for the sixth consecutive time won the championship.

For more on football and sports news, subscribe to @ river_sport!
